import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import logo from "../images/KacaBazarLogo.png"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import seller from "../images/agent.png"; import farmer from "../images/farmerlogo.png"; import axios from 'axios'; // Make sure to import axios export default function Header() { const [showCategories, setShowCategories] = useState(false); const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); // State to track login status const navigate = useNavigate(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // State for loading const userId = localStorage.getItem('userId'); useEffect(() => { // Fetch the current session status from backend axios.get('http://localhost:3000/auth/current-session', { withCredentials: true }) .then((response) => { setIsLoggedIn(true); // User is logged in }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error fetching session:', error); // Log error setIsLoggedIn(false); // User is not logged in }) .finally(() => { setLoading(false); // Set loading to false after the request }); }, []); const handleCategoriesClick = () => { setShowCategories(!showCategories); // Toggle the categories visibility }; return ( <> {/* Header Component */}
(window.location.href = "/farmerlogin")} > Become Farmer
(window.location.href = "/sellerlogin")} > Become Seller

navigate("/profile")} > Profile
) : (
